attributes.action: stop craftily increasing taxes on SMEs, when they are the backbone of Great Britain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is really tiresome for SMEs that we have to pay more in corporation tax when we can afford it the least.  I have run a company now for three years and the sleepless nights come from the amount I, and the company, are taxed, while also ensuring I keep my costs and prices low.    

Why do we bare a greater burden than established, larger businesses?  My customers are large multinationals (so generally their profits will go overseas anyhow), should I now give it all up and work for them instead?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
